ygData.subject: Re: An idea for the slow day
ygData.msgSnippet: I think it would be cool to have a strike that acts like the spell cast by TT s that throws you back :) ... From: Dizzy J.  To:
ygData.messageBody:
I think it would be cool to have a strike that acts like the spell cast by
TT's that throws you back :)
----- Original Message -----
From: Dizzy J. <dizzyj@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, August 27, 1999 11:43 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] An idea for the slow day


> From: "Dizzy J." <dizzyj@...>
>
> I just want to duelweild nunchucks (sp?)
>
>
> On Fri, 27 Aug 1999, Ronnie wrote:
>
> > From: "Ronnie" <ronnien@...>
> >
> > A monk only weapon, now before someone say but out fists are our weapons
> > listen for a sec. Wouldn't it be cool if there were magic gloves with
> > effects? I personally would love to wield a pair of gloves that cast an
> > effect, like life tap or shock of frost. There are just not enough Monk
> > only stuff out there, other then the PoF stuff and the sashes and head
bands
> > I think this would be a nice addition, maybe along with a nifty looking
robe
> > for monks.
> >
> > Palerose Darkthron ~24 circle monk of the Ashen order~ (Tunare server)
> >
> >

> > ONElist: your connection to people who share your interests.
